page.title: 17Epworth's Holiday Happening.
page.content: Holiday Happening is an annual event held in Epworth for children over the Summer Holidays.The organizers and helpers stay at houses in the village. The happening is held over one week with a fun day and an outing included. The children are divided into groups with a name connected with the holiday theme. Holiday Happening is held in the Wesley School Room and costs around thirty five pence every day.That includes orange and biscuits.Children from the age of 5-12 are eligible to take part and it is a very popular event. We are lucky in Epworth to have such an event, and I feel sure that the children who do not go do not know what they are missing.
